issues.description: The problem statement specifies that `LaunchedRollerCoaster`â€™s constructor should only accept `name` and `abbreviation`, but the intended design (and reference solution) requires a third parameter `numberOfLoopings` inherited from `RollerCoaster`. This mismatch will confuse students and cause signature conflicts.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement to require the `LaunchedRollerCoaster` constructor to accept `name`, `abbreviation`, and `numberOfLoopings` (in that order), so it matches the UML design and reference solution.
